translation.Name: Hawaii Note - Aegis 1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: We knew it was more than a pharmaceutical company when frigate upon frigate of armed soldiers started to arrive daily. The military tried to intervene but it was simply too late. Aegis had too much firepower. I think there's still hope though. Word around the island is that the remnants of the coastguard have set up a safehaven to the south. I'm going to begin my journey to seek it out in the morning.
